events.text: Just before entering the temple, some writings pique your interest :

« Many a son and daughter of Mankind possess the [color=#f0d78e]Key[/color], but how much find its [color=#f0d78e]Door[/color]? »
« But this path was never one without danger. »
« Those fortunate enough to keep their [color=#f0d78e]Key[/color] from the eldritch influence of the [color=#9e6af2]fiends[/color] roaming these forsaken grounds shall reach their most awaited reward. »
« Those more unfortunate, however, shall become one of them. »

You also notice some other sentences written in an unknown yet strangely familiar language
While you can't seem to make any sense of these words, their meaning starts to resonate in your mind :
«  [color=#f0d78e]Controls :[/color] Z, Q, S, D to move. Mouse to aim. Hold the left mouse button to shoot. E to interact. »
« Survive for  [color=#f0d78e]one minute[/color] while protecting your [color=#f0d78e]Key[/color] from [color=#9e6af2]the enemies trying to steal it.[/color]. »
« But beware, the [color=#f0d78e]Key[/color] will quickly [color=#9e6af2]corrupt[/color] if not in your safe hands. »
« A gauge showing the state of the [color=#f0d78e]Key[/color] can be found in the top-left corner of the screen, furthermore the key's light will fade as it's state worsen. »
« [color=#f0d78e]When the Door starts emitting light, get to it as quickly as possible![/color] »
After finishing reading all these scriptures, you finaly enter the temple.
